author: Simon Difford
description: Now, we do like a juicy wally (gherkin) with our cod'n'chips but necking the brine in which they are packed is another thing. Our American cousins have some strange habits - drive on the right, carry the ball when playing football and bowl underarm. So these eccentricities should be remembered when I tell you that the drinking of cucumber brine as part of this drink is popular in New York City.
name: Pickle Back

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into two separate chilled glasses
Instruct drinker to drink whiskey followed by cucumber chaser
